description: Around 600 Google employees signed a manifesto that opposes Google’s new COVID-19 vaccine mandate for its potential impact on corporate America and as a matter of principle and inclusion. An open letter was also sent to Google’s chief health officer, Karen DeSalvo.
author: wynniechan
addresses: Google, West Bluff Creek Drive, Playa Vista, Los Angeles, Los Angeles County, California, 90094, United States
